0: Merry Christmas to all, and all a good night
1: Huh, now we all livin’ the good life
2: Yeah, though it’s forty below the wind chill
3: And we wipin’ snow up off the windshield
4: It’s still, wonderful night to be alive, baby
5: And I’m, so happy I’m with my baby
6: And we a li’l late wit’ the Christmas gifts
7: Rushin’ for the mall, don’t trip, you know I drive crazy
8: The streets lit up, it feel like Christmas officially
9: Told her that “You the star at the top of my Christmas tree”
10: My only question is, “Where my presents?”
11: She said, “Shhh,” she got a gift for me that ain’t for the kids to see
12: Well, I like the way you think, mami
13: Now pour some more eggnog in you drink, mami
14: Got a surprise for you that ain’t on your Christmas list-es
15: Gave her the hot chocolate, she said “It’s D-ricious”
16: I peeped it, you know what?
17: Need some reindeer for this one
18: I wanna hear sleigh bells on this one
19: Got a new suit on this one
20: The newborn look too cute for this one
21: Yeah, the new winter coat for this one
22: Yeah, gotta let it snow on this one
23: Huh, all the Christmas cheer for this one
24: The whole family up in here on this one
title: Christmas in Harlem (Other Version)
